New Records: Pakistan's big chase surpassed Ireland's previous Cricket World Cup record of 7-329 to beat England in 2011
Key Match Events: Mohammad Rizwan and Abdullah Shafique scored centuries to lead Pakistan to a six-wicket win over Sri Lanka
Kusal Mendis and Sadeera Samarawickrama of Sri Lanka scored maiden ODI centuries
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammad Rizwan expressed pride in the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: England beat Bangladesh by 137 runs with Dawid Malan scoring a century
